name: SpaceSounds
0:
”Alexa open Space Sounds”
”Alexa ask Space Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space sounds
des:
Space Sounds provides the tranquility of space in the comfort home. No spaceship needed. Space Sounds is your gateway to the mysterious and captivating sounds of the universe.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Space Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
